features: Seventh Generation Mandarin Orange & Grapefruit Hand Soap is gentle on your hands
Our hand wash is designed to clean your hands without drying your skin
No synthetic fragrances, dyes, triclosan, chlorine or phthalates
Our hand wash formula is USDA Certified Biobased 97%
Sophisticated bottle design looks great on kitchen and bathroom counters
body.description: Product Description After 25 years of innovation, we've learned a thing or two from plants: they can clean up our world while being kind to our families. Seventh Generation plant-based Hand Wash gets the job done with no dyes, no synthetic fragrances, no triclosan, and no phthalates. Life is complicated. Choosing a liquid hand soap should be simple. The gentle plant-based formula in Seventh Generation Hand Wash is made with renewable cleaning ingredients that leave hands clean, soft and refreshed. Our Mandarin Orange & Grapefruit scent is derived from 100% essential oils and botanical extracts. Everything should be this easy.To Use- Twist nozzle to unlock and raise. Pump soap into hands. *When used as hand wash to wash away bacteria from hands, lather and scrub for 20 seconds and rinse thoroughly with clean running water. From the Manufacturer Life is complicated. Washing your hands should be simple. Seventh Generation hand wash has no dyes, no synthetic fragrances, no triclosan, no phthalates. Just a gentle, plant-based formula that does what it's supposed to do. Enjoy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Seventh Generation Natural Hand Wash A Gentle Kind of Clean Life is complicated. Choosing a liquid hand soap should be simple. The gentle plant-based formula in Seventh Generation Natural Hand Wash is made with renewable cleaning ingredients that leave hands clean, soft and refreshed. Everything should be this easy. Plant-Based Formulas After 25 years of innovation, we've learned a thing or two from plants: they can clean up our world while being kind to our families. Seventh Generation plant-based Natural Hand Wash gets the job done with no dyes, no synthetic fragrances, no triclosan, and no phthalates. Available With Scent or Without Mandarin Orange & Grapefruit Lavender Flower & Mint Free & Clean Unscented

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and have no issues at all with this soap. The smell is so light and refreshingly natural! Nothing artificial at all about this... I love it and is the only hand soap we use in the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely fantastic product with a history of the company being environmentally friendly and animal friendly. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering. We had to put a rubber band under the plunger so that too much was not dispensed at one time, but other than that this is an excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this hand soap
reviews.reviewText: I had use the hand soap in the lemon eucalyptus scent. Decided to give this one a try. I love the lavender scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Non-Drying! Good soap. Clean scent. Wash frequently and good to go!
reviews.reviewText: I wash my hands about 20-40 times a day most work days. I don't have sensitive skin, but at that rate most soaps will dry your skin out. I have found two that I can use all day at work and not have an issue. My wife has sensitive skin, the same two soaps work well for her without making her skin dry.Soap 1: Provon pink anti-bacterial liquid hand soap. (NOT THE BLUE CRAP)Soap 2: Seventh Generation Mandarin Orange and Grapefruit liquid hand soap.I like the light and refreshing scent of this one. We like to thin it out an make a foaming hand soap out of it using about 60 mL soap to 200 mL distilled water. Still cleans, uses less product therefore more environmentally friendly, doesn't dry and clog pump, saves money.Can't seem to find the refills for this soap anymore, so had to order a case of 8 small bottles... what a waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lathers nice and really does clean
reviews.reviewText: leaves your hands feeling clean/after using dried hands using a white towel and left no residue on clothOnly problem is the way the dispenser disperses soap/it comes out at a very bad angle and if not careful it will miss your hand all together/ I will when needed reorder this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite hand soap for kitchen and bath
reviews.reviewText: I normally go for no scent, no nothing, soaps, but these have a mild pleasant, and natural, scent that doesn't trigger my allergies. I'm even considering bringing some into the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this brand and this scent. Unfortunately, one dispenser broke in transport
reviews.reviewText: Like everything in this world things go wrong sometimes. So, though Amazon double box this item, they didn't put any crushing material in it, and one of the dispensers broke and made little bit of a mess, leaking throughout the box. We simply put all in my sink and rinsed them off. One is half full, the one that leaked, I am simply happy to get it and it so rare that something like this happens with anything I order from Amazon, that I will simple move on. I am only mentioning it here just in case someone at Amazon ends up reviewing this and they will know. I use this brand all the time because I have had remarkable results with it. Thanks Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the smell
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Mandarin & Orange scent and unfortunately, I’m not a fan of the smell.
